title: BitcoinUpOnly
author: BitcoinUpOnly
content: Hi fellow Bitcoin traders,There is a new Cryptocurrency Trading Dashboard where you can view derivative exchange data from Bitcoin and Ethereum in a one-page view. It's called Whaleportal, and you can view it here : https://whaleportal.com/You can find the following data :- Bitcoin balance on exchanges- Price- Funding rates (Current & historic)- Open interest- Taker buy/sell ratio- Premium indexAlso, there are "how-to's" on how to "read" these charts.This can help you get a better grip on the markets, especially for shorter-term timeframes.The chances for traders to create successful trading strategies significantly increase if you use derivative exchange data in your analysis IMO
